      Process a request.
      protected abstract RESPONSE_TYPE processSyncRequest()
      The processSyncRequest method will be invoked by the target Reactor on its own thread when the SyncRequest is dequeued from the target inbox for processing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SyncRequest

        public SyncRequest(Reactor _targetReactor)
        Create a SyncRequest.
        Parameters:
        _targetReactor - The targetReactor where this SyncRequest Objects is passed for processing. The thread owned by this targetReactor will process this SyncRequest.

      • doLocal

        public static <RESPONSE_TYPE> RESPONSE_TYPE doLocal(Reactor _source,
                                    SyncRequest<RESPONSE_TYPE> _syncRequest)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Process the request immediately.
        Type Parameters:
        RESPONSE_TYPE - The type of value returned.
        Parameters:
        _source - The targetReactor on whose thread this method was invoked and which must be the same as the targetReactor of the target.
        _syncRequest - The request to be processed.
        Returns:
        The value returned by the target blade.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        protected abstract RESPONSE_TYPE processSyncRequest()
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The processSyncRequest method will be invoked by the target Reactor on its own thread when the SyncRequest is dequeued from the target inbox for processing.
